duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with and support senior leadership as they execute the strategic vision of the company.
Lead all functions in the accounting, cost accounting, cash management, and financial reporting areas for all locations.
Responsible for assessing the financial performance of the company as well as possible risks and investments.
Actively participate in the development and review of the monthly financial statements and related reports.
Responsible for the financial and accounting policies within guidelines of sound accounting practice and GAAP.
Direct audit preparation work and interactions with external auditors.
Provide input and analysis as part of the business planning process.
Review the annual company profit plan and insure that measurements are in place to help guide the company to meet its annual goals and objectives.
Provide leadership and guidance to all direct reports regarding SMART goals development.
Support the treasury and banking objectives of the CFO.
Review operations and financial business practices to help improve profits.
Assist in the due diligence and implementation of new business ventures and acquisitions.
Direct initiatives to continuously expand initiatives related to business intelligence and key performance indicators.
Work closely with and provide support for the outside tax experts to ensure tax filings are timely and accurate.
Foster a working environment that employees can thrive in that coincides with company culture initiatives.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Accounting/Finance with a CPA or CMA
